sentence.Network_en: The bloodsucker was put to death by the peasants there and then.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸血鬼当场立即被农民杀掉了.

sentence.Network_en: I! I'll report you to the police and have you busted , bloodsucker.
sentence.Network_cn: 我懂了! 我会报警逮捕你这个高利贷.

sentence.Network_en: Don't deal with him, he's a real bloodsucker and will take every penny you've got.
sentence.Network_cn: 别和他打交道, 他是个唯利是图的人,会设法从你身上拿走每一分钱.

in the movie , Saya ( Gianna Jun ) , a 400-year-old half-human half-vampire , cooperates with a secretive organization to hunt down other bloodsuckers .在影片中，400岁的半人半吸血鬼的小夜（全智贤饰)，与秘密组织合作捕杀其他吸血鬼。

entry.def: A bloodsucker is any creature that sucks blood from a wound that it has made in an animal or person.
If you call someone a bloodsucker, you disapprove of them because you think they do not do anything worthwhile but live off the efforts of other people.

example.ex: At last he was free from the financial bloodsuckers.
example.tran: 最后他终于摆脱了那些吸金者的经济剥削。

means.word_mean: 1. carnivorous or bloodsucking aquatic or terrestrial worms typically having a sucker at each end
